Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Point defined by two axis coordinates (two dimensional point), x and y.
    Since:
    20/10/2016
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Andre Pedro, Ricardo Reais, Vasco Carvalho

    • Field Summary

      The axis coordinates x and y.
      private int _y_
      The axis coordinates x and y.

      Point(int x, int y)
      To initialize a new Point we must have two coordinates

      • dist

        public double dist(Point p)
        Given a point, computes the distance between the current point and the given point.
        Parameters:
        p - Point given to calculate the distance.
        Returns:
        Distance between the two points.

      • equal

        public boolean equal(Point p)
        Given a point, checks if the points are the same point with a precision of 0.0001.
        Parameters:
        p - Point used for comparison.
        Returns:
        True if the Points are equal, else false.

      • isOnLeft

        Returns:
        True if the Point is on his left, else false.
